main.name: Matt Turner
main.description: data engineering • data science • machine learning
main.bio: Data engineering professional with 5 years of experience building state-of-the-art Cloud data products and working on a variety of high-profile data warehouse modernization projects.

resume.skillmessage: A few of my top skills. Take a look at my resume above to view full list.

education.description: Business Machine Learning • Data Programming • Deep Learning • Scalable Data Analytics • Data Mining • Project Mgmt • Data Mgmt for Analytics • Statistal Foundations • Predictive Analytics
Big Data Analytics • Managing IT Projects • Database Mgmt Systems • Define & Innovate Business Processes • Business Intelligence

work.title: Senior Data Engineer
work.description: • Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: Data Engineering Consultant
work.description: • Constructed an event-driven data pipeline utilizing AWS Lambda, AWS ECS, and AWS SNS that consumed parquet source files from S3 and created external tables that loaded their data mart in Snowflake daily • Developed a lightweight, client-side download tool for authentication via Okta and downloading customer dataset output on demand using Python

work.title: Data Engineering Consultant
work.description: • Developed Spring Batch application that allowed FICO’s Know-Your-Customer processes to consume Equifax’s vast data sources to provide real-time and batch solutions for customer assessment

work.title: Data Engineering Consultant
work.description: • Migrated Home Depot’s in-store sales data (~50 Terabytes) from Teradata to GCP using a number of technologies like Google App Engine, Google Pub/Sub, Google Dataflow, etc.
